content.prompt: After the French and Indian War, British political leaders were determined to

choices.label: require the North American colonies to pay a greater share of the empireâ€™s administrative expenses
end slavery in the North American colonies
encourage colonial expansion into the Ohio Valley by moving all American Indian peoples further west
strengthen the French colonial holdings in Canada and the northwest to discourage Spanish expansion
convert all Catholic colonists to the beliefs of the Anglican Church

topic.text: 3.2: Seven Years' War (The French and Indian War)

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
